summary:
Updated: Look who\'s Growing up! Now that they are starting to grow beards they must keep them shaved for one year while in \"FLAMMING\" 
Which means they can go out and test their skills and everything else if they wish :) They can be followers for this period and also carry a weapon! 

The next generation of Greybears wandering the halls of
descriptionHtml:
Updated:: Durning Flaming they may remove their hoods, and also can be followers who can carry a weapon for protection, Their Taller, Stronger, Voices are deeper, and they wield the power of the Greybeards! Just take a trip to High Hrothgar and Grab them up...Things are about to get Wild!!!





****Updated**** No need for Console Commands The Apprentices are at High Hrothgar and I have added 4 beds so they can have some where to sleep...I have also changes their names to be more \"Lore\" friendly, More to come in the near future!


Ulfric studied with the greybeards, So they must have needed replacments for themselves when they retire...Here is the next generation! Ardon, Baron, Edwin & Windref..They have to be placed at high hrothgar with console commands my creation kit dosn\'t work, I made them with the NPC Editor...Feel free to make changes just leave me credit?! I can\'t do it myself..

You have to place them at High Hrothgar using \"player.placeatme\" \"actor value\" Just use console command \"Help\" and their name to get actor value...

ex..Help Ardon

Once placed they will go about their business as do the greybeards...
Their names are Ardon, Baron, Windref & Edwin....THESE ARE THE NAMES YOU NEED TO USE THE HELP OPTION IN CONSOLE COMMAND TO GET ACTOR VALUES... If Ardon and Baron don\'t work try Andrew and Ben....
author: Icespiders
